Class RuleSetAnalysis

extends java.lang.Object
    Analyzes a set of rules.

      • RuleSetAnalysis

        public RuleSetAnalysis(RuleSet ruleSet)
        Analyzes the rule set.
        Parameters:
        ruleSet - The rule set to be analyzed. The rule set may be empty but the ruleSet must be non-null.

      • Merge

        public void Merge(RuleSetAnalysis ruleSetAnalysis)
        merge two RuleSetAnalysis results. This is used when two submodules appear in a single program section
        Parameters:
        ruleSetAnalysis - is another RuleSetAnalysis
